􈁴􄗥􄕍􄙘􄖹􄙐􄕽􄙀􄕽􄙀􆿁􄗁􈁆􇖴 Washing and rinsing.🔽􈁴􄙘􄝁􄙖􄕙􄚨􄗽􄚨􄗽􄖶􄖿􄗧􄙌􄗧􆿁􅁥􄚩􇖴 Washing and bathing.🔽􈁴􈂼􄖫􅝝􄙊􄙖􄕙􄚨􄗽􄚨􄗽􄖶􄖿􄗧􄙌􄗧􆿁􅁥􄚩􇖴 Dharma protection.
Homage to the Dharma offering homa.🔽I now pay homage to all of them.🔽The mind of the Tathagata Universal Light,
The heart seal of all tathāgatas.🔽The great jewel samādhi of the universal great vow of all tathāgatas.🔽The great jewel light of the adornments of all tathāgatas.
􈁴􈃁􄙂􈃁􄙂􄗥􄕍􄗥􄕍􄗥􄚩􄗥􄕍􄙘􄝁􄟗􄕍􅁥􄚩􇖴The Four Great Heavenly Kings.🔽􈁴􄙒􄑆􄖶􄙌􄕝􄒶􄗱􄒶􄗱􆿁􇖴The Goddess of Good Fortune.
􈁴􆿆􄑘􄗥􄗱􄕾􄗽􄗯􄛽􆽭􄚩􄙼􄖫􆿁􇖴All the Holy Beings in the Mandala.

original: 御本書寫　　本云以根本御本書之云
